text: Knema conferta is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is native to Sumatra, Borneo, Peninsular Malaysia, and Singapore. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema conferta. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema conferta
